title: Japanese Yen Review: FXY, JPY/USD
text:
ALIGNMENT (Price & Volume)

The Yen's composite trend (UP BO, UP, UP) entered triple alignment yesterday. The Triple Up represents another alignment reset. Alignment resets are common observations during the Alignment & Energy phase.

ENERGY (Diffusion Index)

The Yen's DI and DI2 are -66% and -56%. This combination, a blocking dome, lost strength during the recent consolidation. Blocking domes during the alignment & energy phase often create violent chop until the bearish build dissipates. Friday's DI will be an important read for Yen traders.

Participation (ProIndex)

The Yen's ProIndex shows professional selling. Professional selling, if it continues, will become a bigger concern if or when the primary trend flips down. For now, it's something to watch.
